term.title: quasi-single-strand polymer

item.text: A regular linear polymer that can be described by a preferred constitutional repeating unit in which only one terminal constituent subunit is connected through a single atom to the other identical constitutional repeating units or to an end group.

term.citation: Citation: 'quasi-single-strand polymer' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.Q05002

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
